segments.text: Mr . Phillips ? I have a request here from purchasing that needs your approval .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me take a look . This is for a 486 computer with modem . Who ’ s it going to ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I believe it ’ s going to Ms . Wilson ’ s office .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Get her on the phone , please . I need to clarify this .
segments.speaker: S2
